alert.note: Alert for San Francisco Bay Shoreline; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 4:31PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Alameda, northwestern Santa Cruz, east central San Mateo and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 500 PM PST... At 430 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Los Altos, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Fremont, Sunnyvale, Santa Clara, Mountain View, Milpitas, Palo Alto, Cupertino, Newark, Campbell, Menlo Park, Saratoga, Los Gatos, Los Altos, Los Altos Hills, Woodside, Sunol-Midtown, Fruitdale, Seven Trees and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: San Francisco Bay Shoreline; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains
